item.title: Coworker Influence on Job Choice: Information, Connection, and Industry Switching
item.description: Using a novel survey of U.S. workers, we demonstrate how coworkers shape job mobility by improving workers’ information about wages and job opportunities across different industries.

item.title: Location
item.description:
Mailing address

Professor Dr von Igelfeld
Institute of Romance Philology
University of Regensburg
Regensburg, Germany

Office address

Institute of Romance Philology

Office location

item.title: Office Hours
item.description:
Schedule

Office hours take place on Wednesday at 10am.

Location

By default meetings are in my office. I am also available for virtual meetings on Zoom.

Meeting material

  • If we are meeting to discuss research, please send me a written description of the work that you would like to discus.
  • Presentation slides or paper draft are perfectly fine.
  • If you do not have those, please send a one-page description of the research.
  • Please send me the material by 8pm on the evening prior of our meeting.

item.title: Lender Experiences and Mortgage Costs
item.description: This paper explores how lendersâ€™ past experiences with house price changes impact the mortgage rates they set, driven by their expectations of future price trends.

item.title: List of Irregular Verbs Across Romance Languages
item.description: This dataset contains all irregular verbs in known Romance languages.

item.title: Lectures at the Villa of Reduced Circumstances
item.description: This graduate course presents classical results in Romance philology. it focuses especially on Portugese and Spanish irregular verbs.

item.title: Portugese Irregular Verbs
item.description: This book discusses Portugese irregular verbs in great details.

item.title: Profanity in Early Irish
item.description: This undergraduate course discusses profanity in Early Irish, and relates such profanity to profanity in modern English.
